title: An African
provenance_text:
Ferdinand Georg Waldmüller [1793-1865]. Herr von Hüfler, by 1865. Dr. August Heymann, Vienna, Austria. (Sold at Glückselig & Wärndorfer, Vienna, Austria, May 17, 1921, lot 679) [1]. Private collection, Paris, France. (Sold at Neumeister, Munich, Germany, December 1965, lot 1597). Private collection, Vienna, Austria. (Sold at Sotheby's, London, England, March 29, 2001). (Sold at French & Company, New York, NY, 2004); purchased by Carnegie Museum of Art, December 2004. 
NOTES: [1] This work is listed as "Der Mohrenfürst".
